# HDF5 API:
utility calls to list usefull methods

```{python}
from columnize import columnize
from tables import File as _tables_File, Group as _tables_Group
from pandas import HDFStore
print('HDFStore:', 
      columnize([f for f in dir(HDFStore) if not f.startswith('__')], displaywidth=160),
      'tables.File (accessed by `<HDFStore-instance>._handle`):', 
      columnize([f for f in dir(_tables_File) if not f.startswith('__')], displaywidth=160),
      'tables.Group:', 
      columnize([f for f in dir(_tables_Group) if not f.startswith('__')], displaywidth=160),
      'AttributeSet:', 
      columnize([f for f in dir(_tables_Group._AttributeSet) if not f.startswith('__')], displaywidth=160),
     sep='\n')
```
